title: Commitment
description: A planned economic flow that has been promised by an agent to another agent.

action.description: Relates a process input or output to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, improve, etc.

committedQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the commitment.

involves.description: Actual economic resource the commitment commits to affect.

resourceConformsTo.description: The primary resource knowledge specification or definition of an existing or potential resource.

resourceClassifiedAs.description: References a concept in a common taxonomy or other classification scheme for purposes of categorization.

items.$comment: If possible, this should be a uri reference to a shared classification on the web.

provider.description: The economic agent from whom the commitment is initiated.

receiver.description: The economic agent whom the commitment is for.

committedTime.description: The actual temporal instant or interval.

inputOf.description: Relates an input commitment to it's node.
inputOf.$comment: This will become an array, and also possibly reference Transfer.json.

outputOf.description: Relates an output commitment to it's node.
outputOf.$comment: This will become an array, and also possibly reference Transfer.json.

under.description: Reference to an agreement between agents which specifies the rules or policies which govern this commitment.

inScopeOf.description: Grouping around something to create a boundary or context, used for documenting, accounting, planning.
inScopeOf.$comment: The scope can be any appropriate type of object.  This is most often an Agent, but could also be a geographic or other accounting scope.

$comment: Either involves, resourceClassifiedAs, or resourceConformsTo is also required.  Also, either provider or receiver is required.
